contentencoded: Airing on Friday, June 5, 2015: First up, we'll talk to Marketplace Digital Producer Tony Wagner about why Apple’s late entry into streaming music might be an advantage for the tech giant. And how well have you kept up with the week in tech news? It's time for Silicon Tally! This week, host Ben Johnson takes on Marketplace reporter Stan Alcorn.
title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, June 5, 2015
description: Airing on Friday, June 5, 2015: First up, we'll talk to Marketplace Digital Producer Tony Wagner about why Apple’s late entry into streaming music might be an advantage for the tech giant.
